body:
Hi Mark,

I'm reaching out as a part of our customer success program to make sure that Indivior are happy and utilizing their harmon.ie license.

It would be great if you could share some feedback with me such as:

•             Customer user experience.
•             What version of harmon.ie Indivior is running.
•             Are there any plans or have you already migrated to the cloud ?
•             Any other interesting information or change in environment.

Also, I'd be happy to arrange a call to discuss how we can improve the user experience at Indivior and present our roadmap / newest product enhancements.

please propose a time for a call that works for you and feel free to reach out with any questions.

Thanks,
Sean

__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________


Hi Mark,

Please let me know when you're available to discuss the new CSM program that was established to help Indivior with license utilization and optimization.

Sean Kronengold
Customer Success Manager
[cid:image003.gif@01CED6EC.3DE16290] 617.848.0461
[Description: Description: http://harmon.ie/sites/default/files/harmonhex2012_logo.png]<http://harmon.ie/>

[cid:image002.png@01D348EA.04CD8000]

helps you save documents to SharePoint and OneDrive for Business, classify documents and edit or reply with your documents as you collaborate with your team.
